flawed_nl_solution:
Meryll has written 35 questions x 2/5 = <<35*2/5=175/2>>175/2 multiple-choice questions.
While she has written 15 questions x 1/3 = <<15*1/3=5>>5 problem-solving questions.
The total number of questions that Meryll has to write is 35 questions + 15 questions = <<35+15=50>>50 questions.
Meryll has written a total of 175/2 questions + 5 questions = <<175/2+5=185/2>>185/2 questions.
Hence, she needs to write 50 questions - 185/2 questions = <<50-185/2=-85/2>>-85/2 questions more.
#### -85/2

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 14, not 175/2. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
